ingredients.content: 7 oz fresh Roma tomatoes, quartered (approx. 2 tomatoes)
2 ½ oz chipotle chilies, in adobo sauce, canned

preparations.content: Place tomatoes, onions, garlic, peanuts and chipotle chilies into mixing bowl and blend <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>, then cook <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Transfer into an airtight container and serve or store in the refrigerator.
